ayas.text: iqtarabatis sā`atu wanshaqqal qamar
wa in yaraw āyatan yu`riḍū wayaqūlū siḥrun mustamirr
wakadhhabū wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum ۚ wakullu amrin mustaqirr
walaqad jā-ahum minal-anbā-i mā fīhi muzdajar
ḥikmatun bālighah ۖ famā tughnin nudhur
fatawalla `anhum ۘ yawma yad`ud dā`i ilā shay-in nukur
khushha`an abṣāruhum yakhrujūna minal-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashir
muhṭi`īna ilad dā` ۖ yaqūlul kāfirūna hādhā yawmun `asir
kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin fakadhhabū `abdanā waqālū majnūnun wazdujir
fada`ā rabbahu annī maghlūbun fantaṣir
fafataḥnā abwābas samā-i bimā-in munhamir
wafajjarnal-arḍa `uyūnan fal taqal mā-u `alā amrin qad qudir
waḥamalnāhu `alā dhāti alwāḥin wadusur
tajrī bi-a`yuninā jazā-an liman kāna kufir
walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakir
fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur
walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir
kadhhabat `ādun fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur
innā arsalnā `alayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī yawmi naḥsin mustamirr
tanzi`un nāsa ka-annahum a`jāzu nakhlin munqa`ir
fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur
walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir
kadhhabat thamūdu bin nudhur
faqālū abasharan minnā wāḥidan nattabi`uhu innā idhal lafī ḍalālin wasu`ur
a-ulqiyadh dhikru `alayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhhābun ashir
saya`lamūna ghadan manil kadhhābul-ashir
innā mursilun nāqati fitnatan lahum fartaqibhum waṣṭabir
wanabbi-hum annal mā-a qismatun baynahum ۖ kullu shirbin muḥtaḍar
fanādaw ṣāḥibahum fata`āṭā fa`aqar
fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur
innā arsalnā `alayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmil muḥtaẓir
walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir
kadhhabat qawmu lūṭin bin nudhur
innā arsalnā `alayhim ḥāṣiban illā āla lūṭ ۖ najjaynāhum bisaḥar
ni`matan min `indinā ۚ kadhālika najzī man shakar
walaqad andharahum baṭshatanā fatamāraw bin nudhur
walaqad rāwadūhu `an ḍayfihi faṭamasnā a`yunahum fadhūqū `adhābī wanudhur
walaqad ṣabbaḥahum bukratan `adhābun mustaqirr
fadhūqū `adhābī wanudhur
walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir
walaqad jā-a āla fir`awnan nudhur
kadhhabū bi-āyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha `azīzin muqtadir
akuffārukum khayrun min ulā-ikum am lakum barā-atun fiz zubur
am yaqūlūna naḥnu jamī`un muntaṣir
sayuhzamul jam`u wayuwallūnad dubur
balis sā`atu maw`iduhum was sā`atu ad-hā wa-amarr
innal mujrimīna fī ḍalālin wasu`ur
yawma yus-ḥabūna fin nāri `alā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqar
innā kulla shay-in khalaqnāhu biqadar
wa mā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil baṣar
walaqad ahlaknā ashyā`akum fahal min muddakir
wakullu shay-in fa`alūhu fiz zubur
wakullu ṣaghīrin wakabīrin mustaṭar
innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wanahar
fī maq`adi ṣidqin `inda malīkin muqtadir
